summary: Building on Konahriks Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory plugin, this adds new loot to the Dragon Priests of Solstheim. Includes full armor sets. As well as some new crafted sets.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=4]READ BEFORE DOWNLOADING[/size]
Featured on Hot Files! Thank you for the endorsements!

[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386932702343/images/KA_00title_dba_256.png[/img]

Building on [i]Konahrik's Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory[/i] plugin,
this adds new loot to the Dragon Priests of Solstheim.

[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386930029772/images/konah_ed_50px.png[/img]

[youtube]WGvC4eMjevc[/youtube] [youtube]FU0DBHMklkg[/youtube][/center]

❖ Crafted Heart Stone and Stalhrim sets
❖ Unique loot from Vahlok the Jailor
❖ Full armored sets for Miraak, Ahzidal, Dukaan and Zahkriisos


[size=3]⊰ R E Q U I R E M E N T S ⊱[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32458/?]Konahrik's Accoutrements - Dragon Priest Armory[/url]
Dragonborn DLC


[url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/]See OFFICIAL WEBSITE / GUIDE for indepth information, FAQs, installation instructions, etc.[/url]

[i]QUICK LINKS[/i]
[url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/dragonborn-add-on]» Dragonborn Overview[/url]

[url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/dragon-priest-armory/scrolls-of-abjuration]» Abjuration Scrolls[/url]
[url=https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/dragon-priest-armory/dragon-priest-rematch]» Dragon Priest Rematch[/url]


ALSO INCLUDES PATCHES FOR REQUIEM AND SKYRIM REDONE!

Available in other languages:
